Articles.Content: Amazing! Just when I thought I've seen it all in designing you come across with this Ingenious idea! Wow!

That's exceedingly impressive and I'd love to attempt a replication. Are there any mods besides infernal robotics involved and if not how did you achieve the stability and seemingly automated reciprocation in flapping?

This is definitely going on my to-fly list!

+1internetz to you good sir

That's exceedingly impressive and I'd love to attempt a replication. Are there any mods besides infernal robotics involved and if not how did you achieve the stability and seemingly automated reciprocation in flapping?

mechjeb, procedural wings, and b9 is the bare minimum. I also have some optional stuff on there as well, a camera (forgot which mod), map scan, kethane scanner. I don't use ASAS when in 'thopter-mode, instead I use pitch trim to keep it level, and just keep adjusting course. I also wrote a little program that presses the hotkeys for flapping with the autohotkey utility, which can be downloaded for free online.

Is that running with or without Farrem?
I don't what that is.. so no
That's awesome, now I want to RP Dune-style on Duna!
I wish FAR considered aerodynamics for moving IR parts.
I wish IR considered moving IR parts, its awesome mod, but sometimes (not always) weird things happen when I try to move something attached to something else that is supposed to move.
